sentences.translation: 这栋大楼根本没法住人。

sentences.sentence: As parts of the world become uninhabitable, millions of people will try to migrate to more hospitable areas.
sentences.translation: 随着世界一些地区变得不适合居住，上百万的人们将试图移居到更适合居住的地区。

sentences.sentence: Many families now live there after leaving uninhabitable areas.
sentences.translation: 许多家庭离开不适合居住的地区后，现在住在那里。
